name: Spring Thing 2021
description:
The 2021 Spring Thing Festival of Interactive Fiction features thirty-eight new interactive stories submitted by authors working across the spectrum of text games. Participants chose to place their games in either the Main Festival, where they are eligible for a Best In Show ribbon and prizes, or the Back Garden, with looser entry requirements allowing for more experimental or work-in-progress entries.

  • Baggage, by Katherine Farmar - Inform/Glulx
  • A Blank Page, by Edu Sánchez - Twine
  • Copper Canyon, by Tony Pisculli - Ink

  • Fish & Dagger, by grave snail games - Twine

  • Heroes!, by Bellamy Briks - Quest

The authors of individual games retain all rights over their work. You do not have the right to redistribute, sell, or modify these games without permission from the work's original author.

The SpringThing2021.zip download contains all individual entries under 100 MB in size. Eyewear Cleaner 2077: Demo, Project Arcmör, and Eleanor can be downloaded individually. Budacanta can be downloaded in platform-specific versions from the festival website. Some entries may require online access to play.
